title: SenservaPro
descriptionMarkdown: The SenservaPro connector provides a viewing experience for your SenservaPro scanning logs. View dashboards of your data, use queries to hunt & explore, and create custom alerts for your needs. Start your security journey today

dataTypes.name: SenservaPro
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
DashboardTest_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
DashboardTest_CL
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key).

instructionSteps.title: 1. Set up the data connector as part of your SenservaPro installation
instructionSteps.description: Follow our easy to use instructions on our [Azure Marketplace listing](https://azuremarketplace.microsoft.com/en-us/marketplace/apps/senservallc.senserva)
